review: For preowned this is 100% great quality cant even tell it isnt brand new.

Very great phone no scratches or anything! I was concerned because the box it came in had gotten damaged during shipping but the phone was fine! Battery charges well came with a charger.. Highly recommend buying from Best Buy over all others!

I was super hesitant since it is pre-owned and I read some not so good reviews as well. But the Iphone 12 I got was great. It does have some minor scratches on the side of the phone which is fine with me because again its preowned. But the overall function of the phone is in great condition just like new. Camera is clear battery life is good as well I can last a whole day without charging even when I use my phone a lot. It charges fast as well. The phone comes with a pin removing tool and a non apple lightning charger. Overall very pleased with this purchase
Apple product for a great price! We are an apple brand family but their prices can be high.

Product came in perfect condition. Customer service was amazing there was a mistake on the account where i was charged twice but they handled is expeditiously. Im not a paid nor compensated customer. This is real. I am beyond satisfied!

This phone keeps restarting itself. The 64 storage on the phone SUCKS regardless of buying 2TB of iCloud+ storage. Found out that iCloud storage and device storage are 2 separate storage capacities. If it wasnt for my watch I wouldnt know if I received a text or call. My Watch notified me in place of my phone. My hotspot works when it wants to.  ALL of these issues started happening AFTER I my return period was over. & thats only 15 days.
